required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase II Pediatric Study With Dabrafenib in Combination With Trametinib in Patients With HGG and LGG
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Open-label Global Study to Evaluate the Effect of Dabrafenib in Combination With Trametinib in Children and Adolescent Patients With BRAF V600 Mutation Positive Low Grade Glioma (LGG) or Relapsed or Refractory High Grade Glioma (HGG)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate the activity of dabrafenib in combination with trametinib in children and adolescent patients with BRAF V600 mutation positive low grade glioma or relapsed or refractory high grade glioma.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first 32 weeks of treatment
primary_outcome.description: HGG cohort: ORR as determined by investigator assessment based on Magnetic resonance imaging MRI) or CT (CAT) scans using Response Assessment in Neuro-Oncology Criteria (RANO) criteria.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first 32 weeks of treatment
primary_outcome.description: LGG cohort: ORR as determined by blinded independent review based on MRI or CT scans using RANO criteria.

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG cohort: Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first 32 weeks of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG cohort ORR as determined by central independent review based on Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) or CT (CAT)scans using Response Assessment in Neuro-Oncology (RANO criteria)

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohorts: Duration of response (DOR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first year of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG and LGG cohorts: DOR as assessed separately by investigator and central review based on MRI or CT scans using RANO criteria

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohorts: Time to response (TTR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first year of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG and LGG cohorts: TTR as assessed separately by investigator and central review based on MRI or CT scans using RANO criteria

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohorts: Overall survival (OS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 years from last patient dosed
secondary_outcome.description: HGG and LGG cohorts: OS as defined as the time from first dose to death due to any cause

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohorts: Progression free survival (PFS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 4 months of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG and LGG cohorts: PFS as assessed separately by investigator and central review based on MRI or CT scans using RANO criteria

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients on DRB+TMT: Area under the curve (AUClast)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first month of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Patients on DRB+TMT: Assessed from time zero to the last measurable sampling time

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients on DRB+TMT: Area under the curve (AUCtau)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first month of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Patients on DRB+TMT: Calculated to the end of a dosing interval at steady state (12 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients on DRB+TMT: Maximum Plasma Concentration (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first month of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Patients on DRB+TMT: The maximum (peak) observed plasma drug concentration after a single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients on DRB+TMT: Time to reach maximum concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first month of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Patients on DRB+TMT: The time to reach maximum (peak) concentration of study drug after a single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients on DRB+TMT: Elimination half-life (T1/2)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first month of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Patients on DRB+TMT: The elimination half-life associated with the terminal slope of a semi-log concentration-time curve

secondary_outcome.measure: Patients on DRB+TMT: Predose plasma concentration (Ctrough)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first month of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Patients on DRB+TMT: Measured concentration at the end of a dosing interval at steady state, taken directly before next study drug administration).

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohorts: Adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose to end of treatment (EOT)
secondary_outcome.description: HGG cohort: Incidence of AEs and SAEs reported during treatment with dabrafenib and trametinib in this population. LGG cohort: Incidence of AEs and SAEs reported during treatment with dabrafenib and trametinib as compared to chemotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohorts: Vital signs
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose to end of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG: Assess the safety of dabrafenib and trametinib in this population through monitoring changes in vital signs. LGG: Assess the safety of dabrafenib and trametinib in this population as compared to chemotherapy through monitoring changes in vital signs.

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohorts: Abnormal lab values
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose to end of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG: Assess the safety of dabrafenib and trametinib in this population through hematology, chemistry and urinalysis tests. LGG: Assess the safety of dabrafenib and trametinib in this population as compared to chemotherapy through hematology, chemistry and urinalysis tests

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohorts: Changes in Electrocardiogram (ECG)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose to end of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG: Assess the safety of dabrafenib and trametinib in this population through changes in ECG values. LGG: Assess the safety of dabrafenib and trametinib as compared to chemotherapy in this population through changes in ECG values

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohorts: ECHO
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First dose to end of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG: Assess the safety of dabrafenib and trametinib in this patient population through changes in ECHO results. LGG: Assess the safety of dabrafenib and trametinib in this patient population as compared to chemotherapy through changes in ECHO results.

secondary_outcome.measure: LGG cohort: Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first 32 weeks of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: LGG cohort: ORR as determined by investigator assessment based on MRI or CT scans using RANO criteria

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG cohort: Palatability of pediatric formulations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first 5 weeks of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG and LGG cohort: Palatability questionnaire data for DRB suspension and TMT solution

secondary_outcome.measure: LGG cohort: PROMIS Parent Proxy scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first 32 weeks of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: LGG cohort only: PROMIS parent proxy scale to estimate differences between treatment groups

secondary_outcome.measure: HGG and LGG Cohorts: Clinical benefit rate (CBR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within the first 24 weeks of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: HGG and LGG cohorts: CBR as assessed separately by investigator and central review of MRI and CT scans per RANO criteria

secondary_outcome.measure: LGG cohort: 2 year Overall survival (OS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 2 years from first dose
secondary_outcome.description: LGG cohort: OS as defined as the time from the first dose to death due to any cause

arm_group.description: HGG cohort: All patients in the HGG cohort will receive DRB+TMT
LGG cohort: Patients randomized 2:1 to either DRB+TMT or active comparator chemotherapy.
LGG cohort: Patients randomized 2:1 to either DRB+TMT or active comparator chemotherapy.

intervention.description: Chemotherapy of carboplatin with vincristine - LGG only

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of BRAF V600 mutant High Grade glioma that has relapsed, progressed or failed to respond to frontline therapy
- Diagnosis of BRAF V600 mutant Low Grade glioma whose tumor is unresectable and who require treatment
- Confirmed measurable disease
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous treatment with dabrafenib, trametinib, other RAF inhibitor, other MEK or ERK inhibitor
- Cancer treatment within the past 3 weeks
- Stem cell transplant within the past 3 months
- History of heart disease
- Pregnant or lactating females

facility.name: Johns Hopkins University IDS Pharmacy John Hopkins Hospital
Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center PC-2
UT Southwestern Medical Center UTSW/Children's Medical Center

patient_data.ipd_description: Novartis is committed to sharing with qualified external researchers, access to patient-level data and supporting clinical documents from eligible studies. These requests are reviewed and approved by an independent review panel on the basis of scientific merit. All data provided is anonymized to respect the privacy of patients who have participated in the trial in line with applicable laws and regulations. This trial data availability is according to the criteria and process described on www.clinicalstudydatarequest.com
